title: South Africa: Minister Mildred Oliphant Denounces Fake Social Media Accounts
text:
Nigeria: Four Brilliant Nigerian Girls Win 2015 Global Technovation Challenge press release 
Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter accounts have been fraudulently opened using the name of the Minister of Labour, Hon. Mildred Oliphant. One of these accounts, the LinkedIn, is asking people to make donations to an international funding organisation. 
The Minister wishes to categorically indicate that this is nothing more than a scam. The Minister does not subscribe to any social media platform currently. All South Africans should desist from interacting with these social media pages as they will be conned to popping out money for all the wrong reasons. South Africa
